body_html: I'm also interested in nodejs tensorflow API to be able to use it in a node-red flows that would chain tensorflows graphs and may be other kinds of data analysis nodes. I still don't know much about tensorflow. It may not be the right place to ask but I'd like to know why others developers look for a nodejs api/add-on for tensorflow ? What would be your use cases ?
